bugphyzz 0.0.1.3
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Curation Checks
    • Descriptive statistcs of taxa annotations
    • Write physiology sets

    Fetch physiological data

    physiologies.Rd

    Fetch physiological data

    physiologies(keyword = "all")

    Arguments

    keyword

    a character vector of physiologies desired (see curationLinks). For the available physiologies, run bugphyzz::physiologiesList()

    Value

    a large list of data.frames

    Examples

    x <- physiologies()
#> Finished acetate producing
#> Finished aerophilicity
#> Finished animal pathogen
#> Finished antimicrobial resistance
#> Dropped 3054 rows with missing Attribute_value from antimicrobial sensitivity
#> Finished arrangement
#> Finished biofilm forming
#> Dropped 4 rows with missing Attribute_value from butyrate producing
#> Finished COGEM pathogenicity rating
#> Finished disease association
#> Finished extreme environment
#> Finished gram stain
#> Finished growth medium
#> Finished growth temperature
#> Finished habitat
#> Finished health associated
#> Finished hydrogen gas producing
#> Finished isolation site
#> Finished lactate producing
#> Finished length
#> Finished mutation rate per site per generation
#> Finished mutation rates per site per year
#> Finished optimal ph
#> Finished plant pathogenicity
#> Dropped 9304 rows with missing Attribute_value from shape
#> Finished spore shape
#> Finished width
head(x[[1]])
#>   NCBI_ID Genome_ID Accession_ID                          Taxon_name

#> Finished gram stain
